Articles.Content:
KSP 2 Modding Wiki

We have made a new community wiki for everything related to KSP 2 modding. The goal is for it to become a centralized knowledge base for modders, one that is more accessible and easier to navigate than scattered posts throughout the KSP 2 Modding Society Discord server.

I'd like to encourage everyone who has any insight that they feel could be useful to others to share it there - from basic examples on how to create a basic SpaceWarp mod to making part mods with Unity to specific guides on e.g. creating custom Part Modules or solving some common issues. All you need to get started with writing your own articles or helping with existing ones is to make an account!

Link: https://wiki.spacewarp.org

Glad to see this here on the forums.
Maybe this will tell me how to install lazy orbits.

10 hours ago, Miles1109 said:

Maybe this will tell me how to install lazy orbits.

The purpose of this wiki is to provide help for mod developers, if you have issues with installing a mod, you should contact the mod author

I was just Googling KSP 2 API to see if documentation existed (like KSP 1's) and this is the post I come across...

Y'all are magical, I swear.

3 hours ago, SilverCrown said:

I was just Googling KSP 2 API to see if documentation existed (like KSP 1's) and this is the post I come across...

Y'all are magical, I swear. 

the API documentation itself is not on the wiki, but there's a project for that, too: https://schlosrat.github.io/

however, since we do not have access to the devs' documentation comments, it's really just a list of types and members, meant to allow anyone to contribute their knowledge of the code
